subject: A problem in Junit testing
msgSnippet: Hello Everyone: I have a method called getConnection that retrieves a connection from a buffer pool within a webshpere server (my project resides in a wsad),
messageBody:
Hello Everyone:

I have a method called getConnection that retrieves a connection from
a buffer pool within a webshpere server (my project resides in a
wsad), When the method is called from within a jsp or a servlet that
runs on the server, it works fine. However, when I call this method
from within a Junit testcase (that resides in the same workspace),
it fails despite the fact that the server is still up and running.
Can anyone help me with this?

I get the following errors:

com.gis.gapreport.exception.GapReportException: GapUtil: Failed to
get a connection The property com.ibm.ws.naming.wsn.factory.initial
is not set. The most likely cause is that the jar which contains the
file com/ibm/websphere/naming/jndiprovider.properties cannot be found
by the class loader.
